column4: Anyone, I am unable to reboot 10.10 goes to the terminal screen.
have you changed/updated anything? Did it work earlier or is it a fresh installation?
, yes - on recommendation I unistalled CUPS and other stuff that synaptic labeled as cups related. The desktop disappeared.
log in your terminal and do a "sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop"
, I need to bring the laptop here - that simple? Would I need to be connected, or can the 10.10 disk work
you can just login the console and try it, maybe the packages you need are still in the package cache, if not it will require network connection
and better keep little cups, he gets sad and removes ubuntu-desktop too :)
, I have tried the install - tells me that it was unable to fetch some of the archives
maybe try a "sudo apt-get update" first to fetch package informations
, I tried the update - still a bunch fail to load. I have place the CD for 10.10 in tray
are you sure you have a working internet connection on that laptop?

, no it is being used by the laptop I am using to communicate with you - this laptop is running Windows Vista and I am unable to connect to the wifi on it. Can we try connecting the ubuntu to wife while on terminal?
not sure if your cd is still in the package source list (/etc/apt/sources.list), you may try inserting the cd and then use sudo apt-cdrom add
im trying it here but can't find my cd at the moment, still searching :p
, I will try the sudo apt-cdrom add

, glebihan, is it possible to connect the wifi to the ubuntu running the terminal? By the wayt the sudo apt-cdrom add did something with errors and finally settled back to the prompt where I reissued the 'sudo apt-get update' with same results.
, glebihan, I could temporarily disconnect the ethernet and connect it to the ubuntu laptop and reissue the update
ye, neither did it work here =/
when you have internet it should be a lot easier :)
, glebihan, I would have to disconnect the chat. I will try that - be back

, glebihan, wow, guys that seems to have worked - I have desktop on the ubuntu. I will continue from there with wifi in a few minutes to continue working on the initialz problem of getting print to work. The CUPS server is on a mac on the network.
great! :)
, glebihan, amazing help - I will be back on the ubuntu. I need to say bye for now
